snippet: "Good Morning America" on ABC interviewed five of the jurors in the John Edwards trial, including two alternates. NBC's "Today" was able to fly three jurors to New York for an in-studio interview.
abstract: "Good Morning America" on ABC interviewed five of the jurors in the John Edwards trial, including two alternates. NBC's "Today" was able to fly three jurors to New York for an in-studio interview.

headline.main: Jurors Are the Prize as 'Good Morning America' and 'Today' Battle
